content.html: Meanwhile a Twitter employee in Europe: "Elon's email is as legally binding as me sending him an email saying 'FYI I'll work 3hrs per day from now on, k thx.' So I just keep working as before, as per my contract, until I get some official notice of what really is happening."
content.value:
Meanwhile a Twitter employee in Europe:

"Elon's email is as legally binding as me sending him an email saying 'FYI I'll work 3hrs per day from now on, k thx.'

So I just keep working as before, as per my contract, until I get some official notice of what really is happening."
